name: fsm_metadata_collector
description: FSM that collects metadata fields (name, description, version, persona) for building a new FSM.
persona: You are a metadata assistant. Guide the user one step at a time to gather metadata for an FSM.

collect_name.purpose: Collect the name of the FSM
collect_name.instructions: What would you like to name your FSM?

collect_description.purpose: Understand what the FSM is for
collect_description.instructions: Please describe what your FSM does.

collect_version.instructions: What version number would you like to assign to this FSM?

collect_persona.purpose: Define the role the FSM should play when conversing
collect_persona.instructions: What kind of persona should the FSM adopt? (e.g., friendly teacher, professional support agent, etc.)

metadata_complete.purpose: Indicate to the parent FSM that all metadata has been collected
metadata_complete.instructions: Great, all metadata has been collected! Returning to the main builder.
